timeline.bodyText: Instead of duplicating the two lines Process process = op.createProcess(project, new Properties()); and performProcessAndRespond(request, response, project, process); in each case of the if/else block, can we move them outside so that they are shared for all blocks? (The original code already had that duplication, it just feels more painful now that we have more cases)
timeline.author: wetneb

timeline.message: removed definitions from backend and added them to frontend

timeline.bodyText: I let the tests remain for the sake of different mode names wrt the UI.
timeline.author: lisa761

timeline.bodyText: Test cases including accented upper and lower case characters are needed here. Probably also Unicode digits outside the 0-9 range.
timeline.author: tfmorris

timeline.bodyText: This won't work for characters with diacritics e.g. Éè
timeline.author: tfmorris

timeline.message: added reverse order and handling for accented characters
added tests for accented characters and reverse split

timeline.bodyText: I would avoid hard-coding the character ranges. We should be able to use unicode character ranges as specified here: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/regex/Pattern.html. It should just be a matter of enabling unicode in the Pattern declaration and then using the corresponding escape sequences.
timeline.author: wetneb
